website_summaries.verdict: Its compact size is great for days on the go, but battery life is shorter than that of other models, and 1.5 gigabytes of RAM means it’s a little underpowered.
pros: Compact size is a plus for owners who want portability or one-handed use
cons: Battery charges more slowly than higher-end Tab models, and drains faster
Single speaker offers weak audio performance
Some reports of tablets going into an “endless reboot” loop without a clear solution

website_summaries.verdict: Its compact size is great for days on the go, but battery life is shorter than that of other models, and 1.5 GB of RAM means it’s a little underpowered.
pros: Compact size is a plus for owners who want portability or one-handed use
cons: Battery charges more slowly than higher-end Tab models, and drains faster
Single speaker offers weak audio performance
Some reports of tablets going into an “endless reboot” loop without a clear solution

website_summaries.verdict: The Samsung Galaxy Tab A is a simple tablet worth picking up for its low price, and its valuable extras sweeten the deal even more.
pros: The Samsung Galaxy Tab A is affordably priced and offers many premium app perks for free
Its microSD slot accommodates cards up to 128GB
cons: The plastic construction feels cheap, and the single speaker provides weak audio

customer_reviews.title: Painfully slow
customer_reviews.text: I liked it at first because of it's light weight and pretty nice resolution but the processor is agonizingly slow. Internet browsing reminded me of the AOL days (and no, it had nothing to do with internet speed - I clocked in at 60 mps). At one point, I just Hulked out and smashed the thing to pieces. Felt pretty good to be honest...
customer_reviews.author: G. C. Rich

customer_reviews.title: Battery Problems
customer_reviews.text: Like many other reviewers, there's a serious problem with the battery. Less than a year after I bought it, there were intermittent problems with charging, such as not getting past 25 or 30%, or sometimes getting to 100% and then discharging very quickly even when it wasn't being used; and sometimes it works as it should, but it's too annoying to keep. The problem is now more frequent, and out of warranty.
customer_reviews.author: jayday

customer_reviews.title: Junk...Lasted only 2 weeks short of a year.
customer_reviews.text: Didn't even last a year, screen went into the black screen of death. Once you get the black screen it is almost impossible to get your tablet to operate correctly. I will say that it was a nice tablet while it lasted, but I expect better from Samsung and definitely expect my tablet to last longer than not even a year. Cannot recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Normans

customer_reviews.title: This size is perfect. 8 inch makes a difference to the 7 ...
customer_reviews.text: This size is perfect. 8 inch makes a difference to the 7 inch. The shape for sure is better. Great price too.
customer_reviews.author: Krazie Ladie

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: This is my 10th tablet and is by far the best yet. Fast, very crisp colors, fairly good camera for a tablet and not too heavy. I'd highly recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: All the tablet most of us need or want.
customer_reviews.text: What else can I say? This tablet does just about everything the average user would need. It is relatively fast the speed depending on what WiFi you are connected to. The size is just about perfect for carrying around with your choice of cases. My recommendation on the cases is that you purchase two of them. Buy a Poetic Turtle Skin Grip Corner/Bumper Case and also get yourself a thin leatherette HDE Case - Ultra Slim Lightweight Folio Smart Cover. Check these out on the Web I think you will agree with me. I researched this thoroughly. I would recommend this tablet to anyone I know. Get one (a new one) before they sell out..!!
customer_reviews.author: Pcprntr

customer_reviews.title: Short Battery Life on Samsung Galaxy Tab A tablet
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Samsung tablet March 2017. I have no problems with the operation and features of this tablet. The only problem that I ran into with this tablet is the battery. After 7 months using the tablet, I have to shop around for a battery replacement. I can only get the battery to charge to 41%. The Galaxy tablet has a very short battery life. I expected the battery to last longer than 7 months of use.
customer_reviews.author: Ben80525

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware, this is a 2015 model Tab A
customer_reviews.text: Already sent this back, I bought this on a special last week. I always enjoy Samsung Galaxy Tablets, this one would have been good except this is the really old 2015 model and it was near impossible to find a nice glass protector or case, so I gave it one star. Also, the listing made it hard to find it was the 2015- but the model number gives it away. Stick with the SM-T380, you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: K Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Tab A is a big headache
customer_reviews.text: Had this tablet for about a year. Randomly starting shutting down. Did a factory reset. Same problem. Called customer support. "This has been happening with a lot of our tablets and phones," the rep said, " but since it is out of warranty there is a $70 base charge with potentially more charges. This happened shortly after owning a Samsung Galaxy Amp Prime phone on Cricket and dealing with an issue where the person on the other end could never hear me. I am never buying a Samsung product again.
customer_reviews.author: Neal C.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, solid tablet
customer_reviews.text: Have it about a month now. Perfect replacement for my four year old Google Nexus 7 which had basically become a door stop. Fast, plenty of storage, came with Android 6.0 even though product specs say 5.0. Like the slightly larger size. Intend to use it primarily for internet access, reading books, listening to music and backing up photos while on vacation, but probably will not use the camera function.
customer_reviews.author: Flojo93

customer_reviews.title: Samsung girl!!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had read the specs more and realized how low the memory was...but outside of that it has been an amazing tablet. Picture, sound and performance is really good. I typically use it for recipes, games, music and streaming videos and has never had a problem. I have been a huge supporter of the Samsung product and think its far more superior than other brands. I love that I can manipulate my own data as I please and not having to go through an app to change, delete, edit or add - Yes, Samsung has a lot of bloatware but can be removed.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great so far. The battery seems like it will last very long on a full charge and it’s the perfect size when holding horizontally. I wouldn’t say it’s blazing fast but for the price it runs very well, I’d be surprised to find a better value out there for a tablet. I’m struggling to find anything that I don’t like about it so far, and the only thing I’d point out is that the back plastic is fairly slick. It wants to slide out of your hands a bit while your holding it but I imagine that’ll change when I put a case on it
customer_reviews.author: Username Taken

customer_reviews.title: Works good but eventually stops taking a charge.
customer_reviews.text: This works well and performs well. The display is nice and crisp. The wireless connection is very good. BUT I deduct two stars because of what appears to be a design flaw. Like with many others, I find that after a while it stops taking a charge. We tried to get it repaired, but the store said these things are wielded together and they can't get parts. It turned into a very expensive paperweight. Buyer beware - they work good but after a while they stop taking a charge and when they do, you might as well throw it in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Zootal

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet at a great price. Exceeded my expectations!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this mainly to cast music to my amplifier via Bluetooth and MDC BluOS. It works well for all of the things I use my Galaxy S7 phone for except making calls. It is nice to have a larger screen with my old eyes. The unit performs flawlessly. It has exceeded all of my expectations. With an added 64GB memory card I can easily store my music and photos. I use it when I visit my mother who is in a nursing home to show her photos of the family and friends. Before I would bring my laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Happyguy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This tablet is just the right size. My old one was 7 inches and I was considering buying the 10.1, but I'm happy I didn't. I can hold it nicely in my hand and the viewing size is perfect and clear.
customer_reviews.author: cf

customer_reviews.title: Never buy electronics used
customer_reviews.text: I understand that this is a used product but that being said I have a question. Does anybody sell Fully functioning used equipment? This unit works flawlessly. The charge port however does not. It will act as if it has been plugged in but barely charges sometimes, next time it will charge just fine as long as the cord lays a certain way. Yes I’ve tried 3 different cords including another brand new OEM Samsung cord. Just tired of purchasing broken stuff from dishonest sellers.
customer_reviews.author: B. R. Smith

customer_reviews.title: great tablet for the money
customer_reviews.text: we needed a cheap tablet for our Point of sale system at our small shop. This one works perfectly! plenty big enough for the square app, fast speed, no wi fi issues. Just great overall. Only small issue is it doesn't seem to like having more than one bluetooth device connected. It can do it, but it gets finicky and may drop one device over another. Irritating since we have to have one of our square readers connected via bluetooth but also want to stream music in the shop on bluetooth speakers. I'm sure there's a workaround.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my great grandson; he's an e-reader. It provides that - and everything else his heart desired. The 8" size is perfect for holding for reading and is a good size for carrying around. I'd first considered the 10" but we are both better satisfied with the 8".
customer_reviews.author: G'Gma

customer_reviews.title: The tablet is nice very quick
customer_reviews.text: This is my first tablet and first use of android. I prefer my windows phone, however I could get used to this over time. The tablet is nice very quick, battery is great and does not get hot either. Very nice unit for the money
customer_reviews.author: nubby86

customer_reviews.title: Great little table but over priced.
customer_reviews.text: Nice little tablet and works well. However will not buy from this company again since I paid $50 more than I had to. Costco just beat their price by that amount which means it was overpriced to begin with. Beware if you are looking to buy from Tech-Solutions. You can probably find a better price elsewhere. I could send it back but I don't like doing things like just because of pricing. Other than being overcharge the product itself has worked very well with vibrant colors and is reasonably fast.
customer_reviews.author: seniormerc

customer_reviews.title: ... is not what i was hoping (reliable browser and good reader. I just stopped using the preinstalled Chrome ...
customer_reviews.text: The device performance is not what i was hoping (reliable browser and good reader. I just stopped using the preinstalled Chrome and installed Firefox), to make it worse the battery does not last long at all (about 4 hours), and takes much longer to recharge than any other device I own (takes about 7 hours to recharge). The only features I like are the crisp screen and the expansion memory slot.
customer_reviews.author: Arturo Medina

customer_reviews.title: Good Tablet other than "Grainy" video
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this tablet to replace a Galaxy Tab 7-inch Tablet. I like the 8 inch but all the videos that I play (even Netflix videos) show as "grainy"...so far all the adjustments that I made haven't solved the problem. Never had this issue with the 7 inch. Looks like I shouldn't have upgraded to this model. Adding this to the earlier review:Just spent an hour with Samsung tech support... they have NO CLUE! Worst tech support ever
customer_reviews.author: Dwayne

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Tablet!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas present for my 7 year old daughter. She was using an outdated Kindle Fire and she was getting frustrated because it was slow and she could not download Google Play games. She loves her new tablet! I bought a similar one for son last year so I knew this tablet would be good. This tablet is even better than the Samsung my son has. The screen is a lot bigger and it has more memory. It was easy to set up and it has Samsung Kids if you want to make sure little ones aren't viewing inappropriate content. I would definitely buy this tablet again!
customer_reviews.author: SYR

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Support Apps
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because my old tablet would no longer support the newer versions of apps that I use. I was disappointed to learn that this version fails to fully support the newer apps. I could not download my new Fitbit software or use all the functions because "this device is not supported". Other apps (newspapers, games etc.) are "not optimized" for this device, i.e. not all functions are supported. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat it for the price
customer_reviews.text: Hard to beat it for the price. I returned a Tab E that was just painfully slow in favor of this one, and I'm glad I did. This one actually performs quickly and has no trouble keeping up with me. I use it for aviation, and it's a great, much cheaper alternative to Apple.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Do not get refurbished! Do research on this model ...
customer_reviews.text: Do not get refurbished! Do research on this model, it's been known to have issues. lasted three months
customer_reviews.author: CuziCan

customer_reviews.title: Poor battery life
customer_reviews.text: Overall great little tablet. Bought it I believe on cyber day. Up until about three months ago the battery was not bad but now it doesn't make it over a day and a half if that. After a full long charge. Maybe I should let it go all the way down then re-charge it. Very frustrating. Now I need to go find a battery for it. Not cool.
customer_reviews.author: LizyLiz

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working in less than a year. Do not recommend
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Pursell

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, I'm back with another tablet with Samsung and i am not disappointed, the screen is good size for my needs the tablet is so thin and easy to carry not like the one i had before. I will be doing some updated reviews on the tablet as time goes by, so far the screen is a little sensitive to the touch.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Quality Tablet
customer_reviews.text: I have had good luck with my last 2 Samsung phones, so when the time came to replace my tablet Samsung was a natural choice. Ordered from Amazon Warehouse Deals, Prime shipping rocks. The tablet works great, lags a bit loading some Web pages but that is to be expected. Downloaded all of my apps from Google within the first hour and synced all my emails and accounts. Seems to have plenty of ram and processor, and the SD slot allows plenty of storage. Haven't really tested the battery yet but it seems to last as long as my phone, about a day with intermittent use.
customer_reviews.author: Corey A Fitzpatrick

customer_reviews.title: A Great Tablet
customer_reviews.text: It is much better than the last tablet I had (wasn't a Samsung). Still learning how to do get around in it. I have watched movies on it at home and in airplane. For the price you can't beat it. (Bought it over Christmas on a special from Amazon with free shipping which was lower than the special they had on it at the local WMT.). Only purchase phones and tablets with external storage available and of course this tablet has it. I am a retired old fart and it does everything I need except maybe a nice lady to meet and have coffee with. ha.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot say enough good things about this tablet! This tablet is perfect and is flawless. The speaker is surprisingly pretty powerful and this tablet is all around great! If you are on the fence about picking up one of these, DO IT! It is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Logan Beeman

customer_reviews.title: Can't get started
customer_reviews.text: Has anyone else had trouble getting theirs to work properly? I was going through the "start up" list and all of a sudden it went black and then asked for my password. I didn't even have a chance to put a password in it. :( Been trying for 2 days to get it to unlock.
customer_reviews.author: Demi

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet!
customer_reviews.text: Happy, happy, joy, joy. I was super tired of watching Netflix on my phone! I wanted a bigger screen. My kid shouldn't be the only one that can have a tablet. LOL. This does exactly what I need it to and it works quickly and well. Definitely recommend if you're just needing a tablet for basic day-to-day stuff. I haven't tested it out for more work related tasks but I'm happy to say it comes with Microsoft Office Works as well. I pretty much see this tablet filling every need I may have.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Hunt-Eroh

customer_reviews.title: Fast tablet with a beautiful screen
customer_reviews.text: Upgrading from the Kindle Fire 7, this tablet is amazing. It is not too expensive and performs as well as much more expensive tablets. The processor is fast, and the camera (both front and rear) exceed expectations. It also makes an ideal gift - especially for a teenager/student.
customer_reviews.author: Yuriy

customer_reviews.title: Samsung galaxy tab A
customer_reviews.text: Update- 7/1/18- still going strong, love this tablet! ❤️ I absolutely love it! Would definately recommend!
customer_reviews.author: ML1980

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a gift
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift, I've been told, the Tab A is a beautiful tablet. I knew reading books, magazines and surfing would be the principal focus of use. I started looking for a 8" budget tablet that doesn't feel like a budget tablet. So far I've only heard praise concerning the speed and picture quality. If someone else close to me needed a tablet I would pick up the Tab A again.
customer_reviews.author: Neils Neilson

customer_reviews.title: Slippery battery suck
customer_reviews.text: I choose three stars because it is just ok (like the stars mean). My main gripe is the battery life. I can live with a short battery life, but having to turn it off all the time? About one week turned off drains the battery down to zero. Gotta get a case cause this thing is slippery. But I really do like the micro-usb feature, hope that doesn't go away in future models.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Already having trouble
customer_reviews.text: This is good tablet, not too big and not too small, but it has started having problem and we have only had it a little over 6 months. It restarts all the time unless it plugged into the charger which is very annoying. We have tried a few "fixes" but it didn't help. I have been told it is basically fried. Hopefully we can get it repaired under warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: The perfect budget tablet
customer_reviews.text: The perfect budget tablet. Not the biggest or baddest, but still plenty of horsepower and all of the features I need. Would reccomend for anyone who needs a tablet but can't afford a more high-end model. Have had no problems with it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Connor Pack

customer_reviews.title: Great Tablet
customer_reviews.text: All of my other cell phones and tablet are apple so thought I would try this one even with the added need to get used to the android. Love it! The colors are amazing and the sound quality from such a little speaker is quite good. It is not concert quality but that is not why I bought it. Being able to use WORD, Power Point, and Excell was my biggest reason for the change. Very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Oldster

customer_reviews.title: I wish I knew if it's good or not but sadly it will eventually become obsolete ...
customer_reviews.text: Sigh...I can't review it. I bought it for my mom & she never uses it. I wish I knew if it's good or not but sadly it will eventually become obsolete & sold for pennies on eBay. ...Sigh... She said she wanted a tablet on Black Friday so I got her a good one. She soon realized she doesn't know how to use it nor is she willing to learn how to use a tablet. ...Sigh... I think she leaves it out in plain sight when I visit cause it's always near the couch but I know shes not using it... ...Sigh... That's my honest review. ...Sigh...
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: You will love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is hands down the best tablet with the best screen I have ever owned. I do not use it for business and I play one game, so I don't give it much of a workout. I use it as a reader, involved in a few Facebook sewing groups and use you tube tutorials for learning. I am beyond happy. Recommend by my highly tech, has to have the best in technology son!
customer_reviews.author: Sheryll

customer_reviews.title: Sold as 2018 - NOT RIGHT, it is a 2015 model
customer_reviews.text: The sm-t350, which is what I was sold, was advertised on the page as a 2018 model. That is incorrect. It is a 2015 model. The technology is already 3 years old, out of the gate. The screen keeps getting darker all by itself, even when set at max, with fully charged battery.
customer_reviews.author: Polk8dot

customer_reviews.title: Junk- don't bother
customer_reviews.text: This tablet is so painfully slow. Another user accurately compared it to the dial-up AOL days. I can't use it for more than 5 minutes without getting so frustrated that I want to throw it at the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet worth the little bit extras to get a quality tab
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my mom for her birthday a big step up from the old $100 one she had with a cracked screen that kept freezing and to b safe grabbed a full plastic/rubber cases that has the built in screen protector over used it several times and even with all her apps and games it runs fast u don't have to wait for anything to start up too long and looks great
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Good at the beginning, performance fades quickly
customer_reviews.text: Very slow even with a broadband WiFi connection. Charger port is worn out after only less than 10 months of use and only adults connected and disconnected the device. The system memory takes a lot of the memory that is said to be available for apps. Apps on SDCard cannot always be opened on device after they are moved from the device to the SDCard.
customer_reviews.author: Richard W. Baker

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Tab
customer_reviews.text: An awesome tab! I find the size is perfect, not too big or small. This was my first Android device after always using apple. It's super easy to use and has a lot of very cool features that ios doesn't have. The camera isn't great at all however. And the screen is just ok. But the external storage is great. Oh yeah and it's half the price of an iPad lol
customer_reviews.author: Michael Y Han

customer_reviews.title: I'll never buy a used tablet again
customer_reviews.text: I never got time to use this until it was too late and I could no longer return. I see why this used tablet was for sale. It shuts itself off losing active windows on the reg. When it does work it is super slow. Even typing a search takes a second or so pause between letters. Very dissapointed.
customer_reviews.author: Ken W

customer_reviews.title: Great cheap tablet
customer_reviews.text: I have owned this thang for almost two years and my kids haven't been able to break the screen. Not the best device for nowadays 10/22/2017. But it was comprable in 2015.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Z.

customer_reviews.title: I would buy it again
customer_reviews.text: Much nicer and faster than my Galaxy Tab 2. Even though it's not the fastest tablet Samsung makes it's definitely more affordable and it's fast enough for what I do with it.
customer_reviews.author: PoppaDon

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my husband as an anniversary gift. So far, he's loving it. Beautiful screen, and I've read a few complaints about the speakers on here, but, they are actually not too bad. I think it's a great tablet. Only down side is it comes with a butt load of apps, some of which he will never use, and can't get rid of. On a positive note, he did enjoy a couple of those apps, which he had never heard of before. This was definitely a great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: B. Houlihan

customer_reviews.title: Great Tablet
customer_reviews.text: Great tablet and it's alot bigger than my previous tablets which is a good thing for me, also the picture is vibrant and makes gaming and movies more enjoyable. I bought this tablet because I wanted one that had Google play store and this came with that and other added bonuses like size and storage!
customer_reviews.author: Toddie

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: Maybe if it wasn't defective it would be a good product, but I sent it in for repairs twice, and it still won't work correctly. Samsung is supposed to be sending a replacement, but that process started over 2 weeks ago and there's still no estimated ship date in sight, so 2 stars may be generous at this point.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy M

customer_reviews.title: Good replacement for old tablet without big price tag.
customer_reviews.text: Just getting getting time to start to get used to this. I am liking it so far. My first tablet was the first generation mini ipad so that is a big act to follow. I find it is running faster and doesn't stall out as the mini was starting to do. I just didn't want to spend the big bucks this time and wanted an android. Read good reviews and got an excellent discount during black Friday. I love new toys and this one runs nice and doesn't break the bank.
customer_reviews.author: Biya3

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Refurbished at "good" quality. Didnt see anything wrong with them. I ordered 4 for my kids. Came way earlier than expected with chargers. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: No quality control....defective item
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like the fact that they were clueless as to correctly replace digitizer (screen) and if they did know what they were doing why didn't someone actually test the product before shipping it....what a complete waste of my time....my advice....buy from someone else....no quality control over products being sold....goodluck
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Jones

customer_reviews.title: Samsung's Budget Tablet
customer_reviews.text: Great tablet for the price. Battery Life seems excellent. Despite the poor reviews, it seems to handle simple games fairly well!! I havent tried any fps (first person shooters) or anything 3d heavy but seems great for the price!! The ratio of the display 4:3 is a bit different but it works! Overall a GREAT Budget tablet for the price and from Samsung!
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: I bought like five different tablets during the holiday and I like ...
customer_reviews.text: This is it the one you been looking for! I bought like five different tablets during the holiday and I like this one best. She's a beauty, think I'll call her Gloria. I'll be holding on to this tab for awhile color,performance and WiFi connectivity all good. Only regret is I didn't get the 32gb I had for 3 months and I'm already running out of space but I like to download apps and games. Also a very fair price I think.
customer_reviews.author: yong

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely recommend to anyone looking for a great tablet at a ...
customer_reviews.text: Prefect for what I wanted and needed from a tablet. Charging cord is a bit shorter than what I would prefer but that seems to be the NORM for cords these days. Not one complaint. Would definitely recommend to anyone looking for a great tablet at a great price
customer_reviews.author: Travis Dishon

customer_reviews.title: Very nice but...
customer_reviews.text: I have a mixed review. First, I was pleased that there was not tons of bloatware on the tablet. I like everything about it functionally. I have only one disappointment, thus 4 stars. That is my Galaxy Note 5 phone runs rings around it when it comes to processing power. Oh well. I still like the tablet.
customer_reviews.author: MarvinMartian

customer_reviews.title: Won’t always get “good” condition.
customer_reviews.text: This was NOT in “good” condition when I got it. “Fair” would be more like it. Yes, it worked. But the whole screen was coming off of it. Some people definitely lie about the condition of these!
customer_reviews.author: Shyanne Autumn

customer_reviews.title: Good tablet for the price, good quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my dad and he is so in love with his tablet!! I am happy and I am glad he enjoys his gift, I will be getting another one for my mom as well, this tablet it's awesome can't beat the price is perfect! I'm happy with my purchase! Packaging and all was great thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Witchy mom

customer_reviews.title: Grandson loves it.
customer_reviews.text: Our grandson loved his tablet. It is the perfect size for a pre-teen. We also purchased a full body shockproof case for it. He is a typical pre-teen boy who can be a bit rough on devices. I would definitely recommend this tablet and highly recommend pairing it with a protective case.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good size tablet with nice graphics however
customer_reviews.text: Good size tablet with nice graphics however, after less then a year it began shutting down by itself often when I was in the middle of doing something. It became very frustrating, so I went online and read reviews listing the same problem with no clear fix from Samsung. This was not a cheap tablet and I am very disappointed in it. I no longer use it, it just collects dust now. I got another tablet which was smaller but good enough.
customer_reviews.author: Joey A

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet. It is not the best tablet on ...
customer_reviews.text: Great tablet. It is not the best tablet on the market, but for the price it is my choice. I had one that my nephew dropped in the bathtub so I bought this one and have been very pleased. It is my laptop because it can do everything I need and is 1/3 the size.
customer_reviews.author: Last Boone

customer_reviews.title: Love this tablet!
customer_reviews.text: Great little tablet. Just like all Samsung products, this one shines just as bright.Very fast, easy and reliable. The only thing I don't like is that its a bit slippery to hold. I ordered a rubber-backed case so I can hold on to it better. But other than that I am very pleased. Go Samsung!
customer_reviews.author: Twin Citian

customer_reviews.title: SAMSUNG ALL THE WAY
customer_reviews.text: Samsung is plowing through the maze of tablets and smartphones. Look out Apple! Clean easy direct operation of the tablet, and Android runs circles around other OS'. Using the OTG cable to connect to MIDI on my piano. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Fred A. Cresce

customer_reviews.title: They work great. My kids use them for videos mostly and ...
customer_reviews.text: We have bought 2 of these...one for each child. They work great. My kids use them for videos mostly and they hold a very long charge. The graphics are great as well. I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: This is a great tablet for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tablet for the price. I was replacing an older Samsung tablet that had a cracked screen and eventually died on me. This one is much faster, screen resolution is clearer and charges quickly. I am very pleased with this tablet and feel it's a good product for your money.
customer_reviews.author: Kelley Turner

customer_reviews.title: overheating issues after 1.5-2 years of use
customer_reviews.text: Liking it so far battery life is pretty good about 9 to 10 hours we will see about that in a year or two. EDIT- its now been about 3 years since I bought this tablet unfortunatly the battery life has not lasted (which i expected) however, the main issue I have been getting is overheating. I'll have one app running for about 3minutes and the battery attempts to burn its way out from the back, and sometimes it gets so hot it shuts down. note this is the first time I've turned it on for 3 months and same results sucks but the first 1 and a half year it was great... Sadly not so much anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Love my tablet so much works great
customer_reviews.text: Love my tablet so much works great! No issues have had it for about a month and works fab. Only problem i have is the power cord that came with this is super short but i had other cords that work so i just used those to charge- kind of strange to have a super short cord
customer_reviews.author: rm

customer_reviews.title: This is slow
customer_reviews.text: I bought a screen protector for this and it may be the reason this is so slow to respond to touch commands. I am not sure. I bought this to replace an old Tab2 and it doesn't work any better than my old one.
customer_reviews.author: OAH

customer_reviews.title: Okay so far!
customer_reviews.text: This is a good tablet so far. The only problem is that it is an inch wider than my previous tablet. Having a joint disease, it hurt my hands to hold it. However, I ordered a rotating case which is self supporting and that has given me a lot of relief.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids.
customer_reviews.text: Got these on a good sale on here. Kids love them. The version of Android you run on these allows you to install Google familylink. I have iOS devices and use the app to monitor usage, restrict content and track devices. Would definitely buy for a kid again. Samsung shouldn’t disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: Melton

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy to bought it and I give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.text: I love it so much. I bought this tablet from France, the delivery time has taken about 5 days - so fast-. As the first impression, I found it so good for this price. good quality and good options (5M camera - 1.2 Ghz processor - 1.5 Ram and ful HD plaubac & HD recording.) so, I'm happy to bought it and I give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Shalil Saleh shalil

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet around the house with long-lasting battery
customer_reviews.text: I use this tablet almost exclusively for chromecasting to my TV's. It is excellent. The screen is large enough to review various videos and select the one to cast. The battery lasts for several days between charges. I tried other tablets and they all needed much more frequent recharging. The tablet also works great for normal web surfing.
customer_reviews.author: West485

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use tablet
customer_reviews.text: I have one that I have been using now for 5 years with no problems. I just bought this one like it for my wife. Good quality, easy to read, receives signals well, durable case.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Appleby

customer_reviews.title: It's a BRAND NEW tablet
customer_reviews.text: Was nervous about the purchase. But it is a BRAND NEW TABLET in the factory box, bought one for my daughter, waited to see the tablet, then ordered a second one for my son. Have not set up the tablet yet, since it's a Christmas gift and I want to link it to their phones etc. Good deal.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful tablet with good graphics
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful tablet with good graphics, easy to operate and surpassed my expectations for the price. I highly recommend this tablet. Samsung tablets have always done well for me as I still have my Samsung galaxy 2 tab and it runs good still even after 6 years!!
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Great value for price. Feels slow sometimes, display is not impressive...
customer_reviews.text: Conclusion: It is a great value purchase. Don't expect a high resolution display. For entertainment or a simple application is perfect. Pros + Great value + Great android tablet for regular use + Great quality Cons - Display not so great, you can look at the pixel size. - Feels kind of slow when trying to to things fast.
customer_reviews.author: Amazn Buyr

customer_reviews.title: The Tab A works great with my radio equipment
customer_reviews.text: I use this tablet with the KX3 Companion application for my amateur radio equipment. The Tab A works great with my radio equipment. The resolution on the tablet is great, the screen is bright enough to use outside during the day and the battery last for a long time. I have use the tablet all day and had no battery issues at all.
customer_reviews.author: ddavis

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for my husbands drone so that he has ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husbands drone so that he has a bigger screen then his cell phone. He loves it. Not only does he use it for the drone but he now uses it for surfing the web.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet, samsung rocks!
customer_reviews.text: This was for my four year old, because it's the only way I can use samsung's kids mode. He loves it and his brand new kids tablet protective case with a handle. Great for those long car drives, keeps him entertained and his parents safer drivers lol. I love samsung all the way!
customer_reviews.author: ✿ Brandy Alexandria ✿

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for the price
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a tablet for my daughter to do learning apps on. This one is perfect for us. I love that it has a memory card slot. We've downloaded movies for her to watch during travel.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen H.

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly good budget tablet
customer_reviews.text: At this price, the tablet is great. Great purchase, in a nutshell. Just make sure that you ask for a secure location delivery before it arrives... the carrier left this one by the end of the driveway, literally 10 ft. away from the street, under the mailbox--and 150 ft away from the door at the end of the same driveway. A small package this size could have been easily stolen. Shame on a lazy delivery driver!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product good price
customer_reviews.text: Nice clear sharp bright screen. Can be used outside with brightness all the way up. Nice set of apps included. Cameras seem good. Long lasting battery power, nice keypad click noise to it. Good cyber week price. Pretty good speed and storage so far.
customer_reviews.author: FGR

customer_reviews.title: Winner Winner!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this iPad as a gift for my boyfriend and he seems to really like it. You can do just about anything such as watch Netflix, play and download games, get on the internet, etc. It arrived in perfect condition and I can honestly say I have no complaints at all. He loves it and I love the quality for the great price I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Tabatha Connor

customer_reviews.title: Works great, Updated to Android 7.1.1 on the first day.
customer_reviews.text: I'll keep this short. I'm not sure what version of Android came on it because right after I logged it into my Samsung account it immediately updated to Android 7.1.1. Yes, it is the WiFi only version (I saw another reviewer say WiFi models don't upgrade, not true). Works great, no problems whatsoever. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: J. metcalfe

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST TABLET OUT THERE
customer_reviews.text: Awesome!!! Fast and the screen is better than my desk top computer. Play games, music and movies is in your face action. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: I'm glad I bought this
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Nice crisp screen Fast quad core performance Good Battery life Fast recharge, if you don't let it get below 60% Very thin and lightweight micro SD card slot 64GB Bluetooth works well, my headphones pair automatically. Cons: I haven't found any yet.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Great tablet for the price. Bought it for my daughter to use for her schooling and to pass time with. Great for entertainment and light school work. No complaints at all.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Loved this! Gave as a gift and almost wanted to keep it for myself lol
customer_reviews.author: NMSKH

customer_reviews.title: This is a real nice tablet. The images on the screen are crystal ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a real nice tablet. The images on the screen are crystal clear. The 8 inch is a nice size - not too small - not too big. I like that it has the option to expand the memory with the SD card, not all tablets have that capability. We have had numerous Samsung products and we highly recommend Samsung.
customer_reviews.author: Misty

customer_reviews.title: Compact and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tablet for my wife for Christmas and overall, she's very happy with it. Easy to set up and processor is very fast. My only concern is it doesn't have a built-in camera flash, however, pictures we've taken are good quality. We don't use the camera flash on our phones very often, however, it's still nice to have that option on a tablet.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: One of the best Tablets for our kids.
customer_reviews.text: We love Samsung Tablets and thus is no different. It is replacing our 5 year old one that finally stopped working after having a cracked screen for 3 years.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best budget Tab in the market, and upgradable to android nougat 7.1.1
customer_reviews.author: MFawzy

customer_reviews.title: This is my absolute favorite!! It Mirrors to my Fire Stick Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I have Sooo Many Tablets Including 6 IPADS & MS Surface. This is my absolute favorite!! It Mirrors to my Fire Stick Perfect. Super Fast Shipping, Just Love It A++
customer_reviews.author: Deep Space

customer_reviews.title: Nice tablet
customer_reviews.text: Very nice tablet, nice size fast for what I do Samsung makes good products I have a lot Samsung things TV, phones, would buy again thanks.
customer_reviews.author: barb

customer_reviews.title: A good purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I like most aspects of this tablet. It is easy to use and it seems to work well. The only thing I don't like is that the screen reflects too much light when I use it in a room that has high light levels. The battery life appears to be shorter than I expected but that may be due to how often I am using the device as I am learning how to use this new tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Duane Gold

product_meta.title: Samsung Galaxy Tab A 8 Inch; 16 GB Wifi Tablet (Smoky Titanium) SM-T350NZAAXAR
product_meta.description: Style:Tablet| Color:Black (Smoky Titanium)8.0 inch Wi-Fi tablet touchscreen, Android, 1.2 GH quad core, camera with autofocus and 4x digital zoom, galaxy apps, internet. Frequencies 2.4GHz+5GHz.

Supports WIFI only (Does not support 3g, LTE)
Android 5.0 Lollipop, 8 inch Display; Product Dimensions (inches) 8.20 inch x 5.43 inch x 0.29 inch
16 GB Flash Memory, 1.5 GB RAM Memory, Features: Geo Tagging, Auto Focus, Online Image uploading, Photo Editing
